INKCAZELO:

Inxiwa leZifundo leSebe lezeMfundo leNtshona Koloni linothotho lweenkcukacha ezimayela nezifundo, kubandakanywa iinkcukacha eziphathelele kwezi nkalo zokufunda zilandelayo, kwaneminye imiba yezemfundo
* IMfundo esiSiseko yabaDala noQeqesho
* ezorhwebo
* isiBhulu
* ulwazi-nzulu ngezolimo
* ubuchule nenkcubeko
* uhlolo
* izifundo ngobume bendalo
* umdaniso
* ezoqoqosho
* ubunjineli
* isiNgesi
* isigaba esisisiseko - amabanga R ukuya kwele- 3
* izifundo ngemo yezulu
* izifundo ngoqoqsho lwekhaya
* isiXhosa
* ufundo-nzulu ngezoBomi - kubandakanywa nesikhokelo kwezemfundo kwanoqeqesho kwizinto ezidibene nentsholongwane kaGawulayo/Gawulayo
* izibalo
* umculo
* ulwazi olunzulu ngezendalo
* ubugcisa
* ubuchule bemiboniso kwanokuyila
Icandelo ngalinye elikweli nxiwa linephepha elilelalo okanye iqela lamaphepha anxibelelana nephepha elingaphandle/elisekuqaleni.
